item.title: How to Edit Files in the Microsoft Notepad App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Edit Text in Notepad How to Select Text in Notepad: With Menu With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Copy Text in Notepad: With Menu With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Cut Text in Notepad: With Menu With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Paste Text in Notepad: With Menu With Right Click With Keyboard Shortcut How to Delete Text in Notepad: With Menu With Right Click With Keyboard No time to scroll down?
